page.description: Displays the Append records dialog from inside a form or browse layout.
page.discussion: The A5_BATCH_APPEND() function displays the Batch Append dialog box when a form or browse is open. Note : To make this example work from the Interactive window, you must first select Interactive > Select Interactive Window Session ... > Customer Information.
page.example: dim frm as P frm = form.view("Customer Information") a5_batch_append()
